meanings.definition: The quality or state of being voracious.
meanings.sent1: Her voraciousness at the buffet amazed everyone.
meanings.sent2: His voraciousness for books led him to read a novel a day.
meanings.sent3: The dog's voraciousness for treats made him the star of the obedience class.
meanings.sent4: The voraciousness of the wildfire consumed everything in its path.
meanings.sent5: The voraciousness of the toddler's curiosity knew no bounds.

meanings.definition: The quality of being insatiable or unappeasable.
meanings.sent1: The voraciousness of his ambition drove him to succeed against all odds.
meanings.sent2: The voraciousness of the monster in the movie terrified the audience.
meanings.sent3: Her voraciousness for adventure led her to explore the world.
meanings.sent4: The voraciousness of the storm left a trail of destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The voraciousness of the collector's passion knew no limits.
